resources.string: clarat is an online platform where you can find help and support services. In Germany, there are a lot of support services for children, teenagers and families. As well as for refugees. But they\'re often very hard to find. With clarat, it\'s easy to find help. You should search on clarat family if you\'re looking for help for children, teenagers and families who have problems. And on clarat refugees if you\'re looking for help for refugees."
